mapper.sql: id, subject, type, createtime, optiona, optionb, optionc, optiond, answer, note, difficulty, lessonid, knowledgeid, mid
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from questions
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into questions (id, subject, type, createtime, optiona, optionb, optionc, optiond, answer, note, difficulty, lessonid, knowledgeid, mid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{difficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lessonid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{knowledgeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into questions
id,
subject,
type,
createtime,
optiona,
optionb,
optionc,
optiond,
answer,
note,
difficulty,
lessonid,
knowledgeid,
mid,

mapper.update:
update questions
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subject = #{record.subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
optiona = #{record.optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionb = #{record.optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionc = #{record.optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optiond = #{record.optiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{record.answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
difficulty = #{record.difficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lessonid = #{record.lessonid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
knowledgeid = #{record.knowledgeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update questions set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subject = #{record.subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, optiona = #{record.optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionb = #{record.optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionc = #{record.optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optiond = #{record.optiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{record.answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, difficulty = #{record.difficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lessonid = #{record.lessonid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, knowledgeid = #{record.knowledgeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mid = #{record.mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update questions
subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
optiona = #{optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionb = #{optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionc = #{optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optiond = #{optiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lessonid = #{lessonid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
knowledgeid = #{knowledgeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update questions set subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, optiona = #{optiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionb = #{optionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionc = #{optionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optiond = #{optiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, difficulty = #{difficulty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lessonid = #{lessonid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, knowledgeid = #{knowledgeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select q.*,l.name as lessonName,k.name as knowledgeName,m.name as createuser from questions q,lesson l,knowledge k,manager m where q.lessonid=l.id and q.mid=m.id and q.knowledgeid=k.id

select q.*,l.name as lessonName,k.name as knowledgeName,m.name as createuser from questions q,lesson l,knowledge k,manager m where q.lessonid=l.id and q.mid=m.id and q.knowledgeid=k.id limit #{startPage},#{rows}
